otherNames: God of Learning, I Really Don’t Want to Be a God of School, The Rise and Fall of He Liang, From Top Student to Failure, The Genius Who Lost It All, He Liang’s Curse, Reclaiming My Place at the Top, 我真不想当学神
synopsis: It only takes three months to go from a top student to a poor student! As the college entrance examination approaches, He Liang is expelled from school! When fate plays tricks on him, he suddenly hears a strange sound of the awakening of the God of Learning system. Ding! I am He Liang, the almighty God of Learning!
